articles.author: Dan Rosenzweig-Ziff
articles.title: 3 bodies found in Mexico during search for missing American, Australians - The Washington Post
articles.description: The bodies, which were not publicly identified, were in the same area where Carter Rhoad and Australians Jake and Callum Robinson were reported missing.
articles.content:
Three bodies were found in Baja California, Mexico, during a search for three missing men, including one American, the states top prosecutors office announced Friday.
